name: xeokit-model-conversion-tests
description: Runs all our converter pipelines over a directory containing your IFC files and generates a nice report with Bootstrap, including logs and clickable links to view the converted XKT files

scripts.convert-ifc: node convert-pre-ifc.js; sh convert-ifc.sh; node convert-post-ifc.js;  gulp build
scripts.convert: node --max-old-space-size=4076 convert-las.js; node --max-old-space-size=4076 convert-ifc.js; node --max-old-space-size=4076 convert-gltf.js;  gulp build

author: @xeolabs
